data.message: Why does the newsfeed keep defaulting back to *Top Stories* even though we select *Most Recent*?  I think I know more about what I want to see in my newsfeed than you do.

replies.message: Hi Donna. The same stories appear in Most Recent and Top Stories, just in a different order. Most Recent shows stories in the order they were posted, and Top Stories shows stories from people and things you interact with most at the top. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2rtAKbe. -Jessica
I'm not stupid, I know all of that.  I'm asking why it doesn't STAY on Most Recent when I select it.

I don't want top stories, ever. Why not make "most recent" a permanent option?
Also, I NEVER want you to filter "relevant comments".  Your filters are useless. 
Just make these permanent options in the settings. 

Annoying stuff like this is what makes people hate facebook.
